messages.title: THERESA MAY’S HEARTLESS CUTS LEAVE NHS IN...
messages.content: Tory cuts have left NHS on the brink of collapse says “shocking report”.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Lib Dems have unveiled plans to invest £6.9bn in schools and colleges, reversing government cuts.
The Liberal Democrats have pledged to increase Income Tax by a penny for every earner to fund a £6bn-a-year cash injection for the NHS and social care.

mentions.tacticalSituation: EVERYONE KNOWS LABOUR CAN'T WIN VOTE LIB DEM TO GET COMMUNITY CHAMPIONS

issues.education: The Lib Dems have unveiled plans to invest £6.9bn in schools and colleges, reversing government cuts.
issues.health: The Liberal Democrats have pledged to increase Income Tax by a penny for every earner to fund a £6bn-a-year cash injection for the NHS and social care.

quotes.text: Tory cuts have left NHS on the brink of collapse says “shocking report”.
NHS protest: Tens of thousands march against 'hospital cuts'.
NHS cuts blamed for 30,000 deaths in new study.
Schools face the worst funding cuts in 20 years.

images.caption: Theresa May with the caption 'THERESA MAY’S HEARTLESS CUTS LEAVE NHS IN... CRISIS'
Nurse looking concerned with reports about NHS crisis
The choice on Thursday 8th June between Liberal Democrat or Conservative MPs
Jeremy Corbyn with quotes suggesting Labour cannot win
Text 'MORE CONSERVATIVE MPS WON’T STOP THERESA MAY’S NHS AND SCHOOL CUTS...'
